thread.title: Deborah Faye Talker
thread.title_full: Goway Travel reviewed by Deborah Faye Talker

author: Deborah Faye Talker
title: Deborah Faye Talker
text: Goway Travel helped me plan and book a trip to the Galapagos Islands, which are incredible. My hotel accommodations in Quito (Hotel Patio Andaluz) and Guayaquil (Oro Verde) were excellent. The ship on which I spent 7 nights, the Galapagos Legend, was wonderful; a comfortable cabin, excellent food, a great crew and very knowledgeable guides. My experience with Goway was positive from the start and the Senior Sales travel specialist who assisted me, Michael Rigillo was excellent. I will use Goway again in the future.
